item.title: Flexible, Powerful Static Website Creation with Hugo
item.author: eric@ericcarlisle.com (Eric Carlisle)
item.description: The static website has been reborn! Using a static site generator can simplify website production, optimize performance, and improve security. By streamlining the production process, static site generators can make more time for creating content instead of maintaining the plumbing that delivers it. Written in Go, the Hugo static site generator (SSG) is very fast and built for performance. What also makes it stand out is an extremely powerful, flexible content model.

item.title: Considering Static Site Generation with HUGO at dev.Objective()
item.author: eric@ericcarlisle.com (Eric Carlisle)
item.description: I recently attended this year’s dev.Objective() web conference and was given an opportunity to present Static Site Generation with HUGO. Dev.Objective() always brings in heavy-duty brain power so I was very excited to geek out, get questions and in this case, challenge comfort zones.
